ðŸ“– Summary: AgentGuard is a real-time guardrail for AI agents that monitors token spend and automatically stops execution when a defined cost limit is reached. It helps developers avoid unexpected high costs due to infinite loops or other bugs in their AI workflows by providing immediate feedback and control over API usage.
